Nginx Docker Server

{% raw %} 
import time
import subprocess

from will_it_saturate.servers import BaseServer
from will_it_saturate.registry import register_model
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class NginxDockerServer[source]

NginxDockerServer(protocol:str='http', name:str='nginx/docker', host:str='localhost', port:int=8000, docker_name:str='wis-nginx', data_root:str='data', subprocess_kwargs:dict={'shell': True, 'capture_output': True, 'text': True}) :: BaseServer

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Usage

{% raw %} 
server = NginxDockerServer()
server.start()
print(server.docker_id)
server.stop()
print("stopped..")
print(server.docker_id)
print(server.started)
